attributes.action: Agree that roadpricing and congestion charges are necessary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Road-pricing and especially congestion-charging are necessary to discourage excessive and selfish driving.

I write as a town and country driver.

I do not support vehicle-tracking, however. It smacks too much of 'Big Brother'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
